settings.html_content:
IMPORTANT CUSTOMER ACCOUNT UPDATES

We've made some recent website improvements that require reactivation of existing customer accounts and you shoud have recieved an email with information on these changes.


If you created your account prior to 23 August 2023 and you have not logged in after 1 September 2023, please reactivate your account by clicking here.


We apologize for any inconvenience, please contact our Customer Relations Team if you require any assistance customer.service@xtend-life.com
